attendance.translation[0].definitions[0]: the number of people who attend a game, concert, meeting etc
We have an average attendance of 4,000 fans per game.
Last yearâ€™s fair saw attendance figures of 32,000.
attendance.translation[0].definitions[1]: when someone goes to a meeting, class etc, or an occasion when they go
The doctor will have a record of her attendances.
Most courses involve an average of eight hours' attendance at college each week.
attendance.translation[1].definitions[0]: the number of people who attend something such as a meeting, or who go to see an event such as a football match etc
Seven jobs were axed at the zoo after a 50% drop in attendances.
attendance.translation[1].definitions[1]: the fact that you go to something that is held regularly, or the number of times that you go
the attendance of Scottish companies at European events
The school has introduced rewards for good attendance.
